data.trans: Có các cửa hàng trải dọc theo
data.trans_hint: Đại lộ Imperia trải dài từ Bắc chí Nam với các cửa hàng trải dọc theo đường đi.
data.en_hint: Imperia avenue runs from north to south and is lined with shops.
data.content_game_1: Imperia avenue runs from north to south and is lined with shops.
data.answer_en_hint: Imperia avenue runs from north to south and is lined with shops.

data.trans_hint: Rất nhiều du khách đã đổ xô về vùng này để chiêm ngưỡng những núi đá tuyệt đẹp.
data.en_hint: A lot of tourists flocked to this area to marvel at breathtaking rocky mountains.
data.content_game_1: A lot of tourists flocked to this area to marvel at breathtaking rocky mountains.
data.answer_en_hint: A lot of tourists flocked to this area to marvel at breathtaking rocky mountains.

data.trans_hint: Những cánh đồng lúa bất tận là đặc trưng điển hình của một làng quê Việt Nam.
data.en_hint: Open paddy fields are the epitome of a typical Vietnamese countryside.
data.content_game_1: open paddy fields are the epitome of a typical Vietnamese countryside.
data.answer_en_hint: open paddy fields are the epitome of a typical Vietnamese countryside.

data.trans_hint: Khi đang đi ven theo bìa rừng, chúng tôi tình cờ tìm được một con sông chảy xiết.
data.en_hint: While going along the side of the forest, we came across a fast-flowing river.
data.content_game_1: While going along the side of the forest, we came across a fast-flowing river.
data.answer_en_hint: While going along the side of the forest, we came across a fast-flowing river.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi có thể dễ dàng chiêm ngưỡng toàn cảnh của bức tượng sừng sững trên đình núi từ phía xa.
data.en_hint: We could easily admire the whole view of the statue towering at the top of the mountain from afar.
data.content_game_1: We could easily admire the whole view of the statue towering at the top of the mountain from afar.
data.answer_en_hint: We could easily admire the whole view of the statue towering at the top of the mountain from afar.

data.trans_hint: Vùng đất này được biết đến rộng rãi với những ngọn núi cao sừng sững hùng vĩ trên cả nước.
data.en_hint: This area is nationally renowned for its spectacular towering mountains.
data.content_game_1: This area is nationally renowned for its spectacular towering mountains.
data.answer_en_hint: This area is nationally renowned for its spectacular towering mountains.

data.trans_hint: Những vùng quê nguyên sơ ngày nay đang dần bị thay thế bởi các khu công nghiệp do hệ quả tất yếu của công cuộc công nghiệp hóa.
data.en_hint: Unspoilt countrysides nowadays are soon replaced by industrial zones as a result of industrialization.
data.content_game_1: unspoilt countrysides nowadays are soon replaced by industrial zones as a result of industrialization.
data.answer_en_hint: unspoilt countrysides nowadays are soon replaced by industrial zones as a result of industrialization.

data.trans_hint: Rất nhiều người thích du lịch tới Sapa vì nơi đây có phong cảnh núi non và thung lũng tuyệt đẹp.
data.en_hint: A lot of people would love to travel to Sapa as the place offers a lot of stunning sceneries of mountains and valleys. .
data.content_game_1: A lot of people would love to travel to Sapa as the place offers a lot of stunning sceneries of mountains and valleys. .
data.answer_en_hint: A lot of people would love to travel to Sapa as the place offers a lot of stunning sceneries of mountains and valleys. .

data.trans_hint: Ngôi chùa này là ngôi chùa lớn nhất ở nơi đây và nó cũng nổi bật trong khung cảnh của cả vùng.
data.en_hint: The pagoda is the biggest one in the area, and it also dominates the whole landscape.
data.content_game_1: The pagoda is the biggest one in the area, and it also dominates the whole landscape.
data.answer_en_hint: The pagoda is the biggest one in the area, and it also dominates the whole landscape.

data.trans_hint: Một số loài chim hiếm chỉ có thể thấy ở những vùng hẻo lánh.
data.en_hint: Certain rare bird species are only seen in secluded areas.
data.content_game_1: Certain rare bird species are only seen in secluded areas.
data.answer_en_hint: Certain rare bird species are only seen in secluded areas.
